root: ^Oh hey, you made it! Welcome to the station!
^I’m Arlo, the new lab technician slash repairman. Just arrived here myself recently. What’s your name?
^Uh huh, I’m Endo. Where’s everyone else? You’re obviously not who I report to.
^...Oh, it’s just us. Plus the AI. Anyways, I’m supposed to give you this, for you to record your findings on once you’re setup.
^Employee 357, welcome to SEA.E.O’s underwater station! I am INTRA, the integrated robotic assistant here.
^Employee 401, please show Employee 357 around. SEA.E.O formally welcomes you here!
